titleStmt.title: The examination of John Walsh before Maister Thomas Williams, commissary to the Reuerend father in God William Bishop of Excester, vpon certayne interrogatories touchyng wytchcrafte and sorcerye, in the presence of diuers ge[n]tlemen and others. The .xxiii. of August. 1566.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwelling in litle Britain streete wythout Aldersgate. 1566.,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The examination of a sorcerer.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
